titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of in the primary visitation of the right reverend father in God John Lord Bishop of Rochester and exhibited to the church-wardens and side-men of every parish within the diocese of Rochester, in September, 1668.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Rochester. Bishop (1666-1683 : Dolben)
Dolben, John, 1625-1686.

notesStmt.note: Text of articles in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
